Title: Skin in the Game
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Aaron Korsh, Sharyn Rothstein (executive story editor), Sandra Silverstein (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Mike returns to Pearson Specter Litt while Harvey takes the reins. Louis manages the new associates. Donna and Rachel find their places.
